title: Wireframe States Template Schema
description: Universal template for documenting wireframes, UI states, and user flow patterns across any design tool or platform. Provides structured placeholders for screen states, user journeys, interactions, and accessibility considerations.

metadata.description: Wireframe project identification and context information

projectName.description: Descriptive name for this wireframe project

version.description: Semantic version of this wireframe project

designTool.description: Primary design tool or platform used

lastUpdated.description: ISO 8601 timestamp of last wireframe update

projectType.description: Type of application or interface being wireframed

description.description: Detailed description of wireframe project scope and goals

stakeholders.description: Team members and stakeholders involved in wireframe project

designContext.description: Design system and visual context for wireframes

designSystemIntegration.description: Integration with design system or style guide

systemReference.description: Reference to design system or style guide

userFlows.description: User journey flows and navigation patterns

flowDescription.description: Detailed description of the user flow

userType.description: Type of user for this flow

flowPriority.description: Priority level of this user flow

flowSteps.description: Individual steps in the user flow

userAction.description: Action the user performs in this step

expectedOutcome.description: Expected result of the user action

successCriteria.description: Criteria for successful completion of the flow

painPoints.description: Identified pain points or challenges in the flow

screens.description: Individual screen definitions with states and content

screenRoute.description: URL route or navigation path to this screen

screenDescription.description: Detailed description of screen purpose and content

deviceContext.description: Device and viewport context for the screen

stateDescription.description: Description of when and why this state occurs

wireframeContent.description: Wireframe content and structure for this state

annotations.description: Annotations and notes for this state

stateManagement.description: State management patterns and transitions between screen states

condition.description: Condition that must be met for transition

guards.description: Conditions that must be met for transition to occur

stateLogic.description: Logic and rules governing state behavior

defaultStates.description: Default states for different screen types

interactions.description: User interactions and interface behavior patterns

interactionPatterns.description: Common interaction patterns used in the wireframes

implementation.description: How the interaction pattern is implemented

supported.description: Whether screen reader support is provided

testing.description: Testing strategies and validation approaches for wireframes

successMetrics.description: Metrics used to measure testing success

validationMethods.description: Methods used to validate wireframe effectiveness

implementation.description: How the validation method is implemented

iterationPlan.description: Plan for iterating on wireframes based on testing results
